text: Motion
Motion
Good job, Kaho
You seemed to be in really good spirits today, didn't you?

Hehe!
Somehow, I was able to concentrate a lot!

Oh, because of that,
we were able to wrap up the shooting early.

Oh,
by the way, Kaho, are you still feeling energetic?

Huh?
Yes, I'm feeling great!

Before heading back to the office, how about we stop by the park for
a bit? We can have a drink and take a breather. What do you think?

!!
I'd love to go!

Alright then!
It'll just be for a little while so we won't be late.
Yes!
-Ahh!

This juice,
is so sweet and delicious!

Thank you so much,
Producer-san!

The drink after work always tastes better
as a reward for your hard work.
It's because you worked hard, Kaho.
Hehe...!

Do we have a little more time? What do you say?
Want to play on the playground equipment?

!
Let's see who can swing higher on the swings!
Oh!

Hmm?
Oh, it's a puppy... maybe a Shiba Inu.

It has such a tiny tail!
So cute!
I see...
Kaho, do you like dogs?
I love them!

We have a Shiba Inu named MameMaru at home!
He's so, so adorable!
MameMaru...?

Oh!
He's the Shiba Inu we have at home!
He's full of energy, smart...!
and we've been together since he was little!

Oh, really...!
I'd love to meet MameMaru sometime.

Really!?
I'm sure you'll get along right away!

It sounds like it would be fun to walk
MameMaru with you, Producer-san!

Since the office is within walking distance,
if the timing is right, it seems possible!
Huh...?

Oh!
It's that dog from earlier...!
It's looking over here!

Maybe it wants to play with you?
Look, its owner is waving at us.

Oh, I see...!
It's okay, we have time, go ahead and play!

Yay!
Thank you so much! I'll be right back!
